ai-patthana15.27:0.2_0: The Order of the Dhamma: allows unintelligent in the Khadehaka, that is to say, the Lord of the Death,
ai-patthana15.27:0.3_0: Talking on what is skillful, etc.,
ai-patthana15.27:1.1_0: Doesn’t give rise to skillful qualities, or unskillful qualities because of what is skillful.
ai-patthana15.27:2.1_0: Doesn’t give rise to what is unskillful, or skillful?
ai-patthana15.27:3.1_0: When something is undetermined, not cause or conditioned, there is no cause or condition.
